div.h1: We are currently accepting applications for the 2020-2021 school year!
We are hosting our lottery on Wednesday April 8,2020

span.style: font-family: Georgia; font-weight: normal; font-size: x-large;
font-family: Georgia; font-weight: normal; font-size: x-large;

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_blurb et_pb_blurb_1 et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_blurb_position_top et_pb_bg_layout_light

div.h4: If you have any questions about the application process or about our open houses please contact Ms. Maldonado at 347-746-1558 Ext 116 or email her at emaldonado@legacycollegeprep.org

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_blurb et_pb_blurb_2 et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_blurb_position_top et_pb_bg_layout_light

p.strong: We will be hosting our lottery for our High school on April 15.

div.p:
Topic: Legacy College Preparatory Charter School Lottery (9th Grade)
Time: Apr 15, 2020 10:00 AM Eastern Time (US and Canada)

div.h2: Legacy College Prep will be closed from March 16th through April 29th
div.div: Starting on Monday (3/23), “Grab and Go” meals will not be available at Legacy BUT you can pick up “Grab and Go” meals at other nearby locations including South Bronx Prep (360 E 145th Street), PS 5 (564 Jackson Ave.), and PS 18 (502 Morris Ave) from 7:30AM-1:30PM. See other locations here.

div.span: for community resources that you can use during this COVID-19 epidemic.

div.div: All parent communication will be sent out through Parent Square, please make sure to activate your account, if you need assistance with activating this account please contact us at 347-746-1558 or email us at operations@legacycollegeprep.org

If you are a first responder, health care provider, or transit worker whose child is a New York City resident, and you have no other child care option, please complete this survey to begin your enrollment process in a childcare center.

div.h2: Legacy College Prep estará cerrado del 16 de marzo al 29 de abril
div.p: A partir del lunes (3/23), las comidas “Grab and Go” no estarán disponibles en Legacy PERO puede recoger comidas “Grab and Go” en otros lugares cercanos, incluyendo South Bronx Prep (360 E 145th Street), PS 5 ( 564 Jackson Ave.) y PS 18 (502 Morris Ave) de 7:30 a.m. a 1:30 p.m. Ver otros lugares aquí.
Haga clic aquí para obtener recursos de la comunidad que puede usar durante esta epidemia de COVID-19.

Toda la comunicación con los padres se enviará a través de Parent Square, asegúrese de activar su cuenta, si necesita ayuda para activar esta cuenta, contáctenos al 347-746-1558 o envíenos un correo electrónico a operations@legacycollegeprep.org

Si usted es el primero en responder, el proveedor de atención médica o el trabajador de tránsito cuyo hijo es residente de la ciudad de Nueva York y no tiene otra opción de cuidado infantil, complete esta encuesta para comenzar su proceso de inscripción en un centro de cuidado infantil.
